snippet.title: Danger Mouse In The Black Forest Chateau (C64 Longplay)
snippet.description:
(Use the Youtube speed setting to slow the video if you find it too fast)

I noticed there is already a complete playthrough on Youtube but it is for a different system. For the sake of completeness here is a complete C64 longplay.

Be aware, in order to try and keep the time down I don't hang around when selecting the options. Due to the lack of sound in this game, you can take advantage of the Youtube speed setting to slow the video down to a readable pace if you need to.
